name: Magic Internet Money (Meme)
description: MIM – Magic Internet Money is a meme-driven project inspired by the OG DeFi platform abracadabra.money. It leverages the playful nature of meme culture on the Sonic blockchain—a platform known for its robust DeFi ecosystem. The project is designed as both a humorous nod to internet culture and a functional asset that participates in liquidity provision and other DeFi activities. By combining humor with innovative mechanisms, MIM seeks to engage a broad community of degenerate enthusiasts and create a lasting impact in the rapidly evolving space of DeFi. The focus remains on merging meme aesthetics with genuine DeFi mechanics, making the project both entertaining and valuable.
